name: Now that I've got a new car, I need a new mount for my iPhone X, and I'd really like one that provides Qi wireless charging. Anyone have recommendations? I'd prefer dash or window mount to air vent, since it works better in my new ride.

content.html: Now that I've got a new car, I need a new mount for my iPhone X, and I'd really like one that provides Qi wireless charging. Anyone have recommendations? I'd prefer dash or window mount to air vent, since it works better in my new ride.

summary: I’d try this one if I were in the market. They’re all fairly inelegant, in my opinion, but don’t see how to get around this with a wire hanging down. Maybe you can tape it or otherwise hide it on seams: amazon.com/dp/B0754NDNT8/…

summary: Interesting. How long is the cable?

summary: About 3-4 ft. It routes OK I just have longer lightning cables in the car so it seems just a bit short. It routes OK I’d just be happier with more flexibility, but I also have a minivan so YMMV
